thread.title: Bobbies on the beach: British police officers patrol Magaluf resort, in pictures
thread.title_full: Bobbies on the beach: British police officers patrol Magaluf resort, in pictures

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Bobbies on the beach: British police officers patrol Magaluf resort, in pictures
text:
MORE... 
Wanted: A pair of British bobbies to patrol the mean streets of Magaluf, a notoriously seedy den of irresponsible drinking, vomiting and debauchery. A hot summer fighting the good fight on the grittiest of stages. There won't be any time for fun - and certainly no holiday snaps... Picture: Nick Ansell/PA
